alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 9:42AM CDT until March 28 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding of farmland along the river is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 18.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will begin rising this afternoon. It will then rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and crest at 19.5 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Yockanookany River Ofahoma 19.0 18.2 Fri 8 am CDT 18.7 19.5 18.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
